thread.title: This 19-year-old chef has been a culinary phenom since age 12 — here’s how he’s dealing with the hype behind his first NYC restaurant

title: This 19-year-old chef has been a culinary phenom since age 12 — here’s how he’s dealing with the hype behind his first NYC restaurant
text: This 19-year-old chef has been a culinary phenom since age 12 — here’s how he’s dealing with the hype behind his first NYC restaurant 47 Mins Ago Flynn McGarry, 19, is the chef at Gem on New York's Lower East Side. Having been celebrated in the culinary world since he was 12, McGarry is now working to shed the "kid chef" label with his first permanent fine dining restaurant.
